pages.title: Kamen Rider Naki
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:zero_one/devices/metsuboujinrai_forceriser#forceriser_naki)MetsubouJinrai Forceriser (Naki)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance II$(li)Haste III$(li)Strength III
